title: Weave me a rainbow
creator_credit: Edward McConnell, Films of Scotland and Templar Film Studios
brief_description: Wool is born, not made. The dyeing and weaving of wool in Scotland, in colors and textures inspired by Scotland’s own landscape, and the production of fine woollen cloth form the main theme of the film.
creator_credit_for_label: Edward McConnell, Films of Scotland and Templar Film Studios
